Class ForumMessageClient

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.jboard.model.forum.clients.ForumBaseClient
      net.sf.jboard.model.forum.clients.ForumMessageClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConstantsMessages
public class ForumMessageClient
extends ForumBaseClient
implements ConstantsMessages

the ForumMessageClient client which interact with the DAO layer to act on the DATA layer. the visibility of this class is reduces to package. the only public class is ForumFacadeClient.
